I'm expecting a fun adventure/action movie!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"

content: The first one was good, and I hope to see the second (though I read a couple reviews and I doubt this one will be wuite as good).  Unfortunately I may not be able to see it until it's released on video, unless it lasts quite a while in theaters.

title: Dead Man's Chest
content:
Saw this the other day. It's an alright movie, but the story doesn't quite have the same flow as the first instalment. It also has an air of 'more-of-the-same', reusing a few gags and the overall style.

Nonetheless it's definitely worth seeing, though I'm not inclined to watch it a second time at the cinema.

title: Re: Dead Man's Chest
content:
I don't really disagree with the earlier opinions.
It can be described as more of the same, but with a different theme.
The original features a quest for a chest with a special kind of pirates, and the second... well, pretty much the same now that I think of it.
Now the ghost pirates aren't the bad guys, and there is a different chest.
It wouldn't be a very good idea to make a completely different film; the original was well-liked (as far as I know).

I had to think about The Matrix as well.
The original was just that, a single film.
Then part 2 was made, which didn't really add anything in my opinion.
You have to see 3 as well, because only both of those really allow for a proper continuation of the story, although I still think maybe just the 1 might've been better.
It's somewhat similar here with the cliffhanger at the end.Retodon8

title: Re: Dead Man's Chest
content:
Pretty good, saw it yesterday...

My mom and my 3 youngest brothers left for colorado at the beggining of augest (thus my grounding from computer for life is lifted, unofficially, till she comes back) and so I saw it with my 12 year old brother (I have 4 brothers!!!)

Its pretty good. The fight on the mill wheel was funny, and the scene after the credits sends you home content, and compleated... though it leaves you hanging, but in a good way; the way that makes them rich when POTC 3 comes out.
